text: Ni$ Issawel awen Öebbi tidep, di lemâahda S, mi ten tesnegrem, s tsriê iS. Armi, mi tfeclem, temnamarem f lameô, taâûam mbaâd ma Issken awen d ayen têemmlem. Garawen wid ib$an ddunit, garawen wid ib$an laxert. Sinna, Issebâad ikwen fellasen, iwakken a kwen Ijeôôeb. Ni$ Isemmeê awen. Öebbi d Bab n lfevl i lmumnin.
